Text:
hi,

not sure how to inbox you. Just wondering how I can convert this to .iso. Also if these are original CD images, does that mean if the song was 462mb on the cd, it'll be 452mb as an image? And just to make sure, there's no quality loss in this is there? If it's just the CD rips? Thanks.

great! Much better than Stereo! Some advice on how to get nrg's into i tunes. It came up at 1 audio file on toast titanium so i burned it to disk (virtually), then mounted this virtual Sd2f file and all 13 songs came up in i tunes. ty for the upload!

Thank U gr8franks
and so many thanks too pp_11 for share the way to convert the images into tracks, i cant find the way by myself. THX!
